results.name: ROOST Detroit
results.description: Located in the completely reimagined Book Tower, Roost Detroit offers the perfect vantage point to enjoy the heart and soul of the Motor City. Featuring an assortment of inviting restaurants and bars, world-class hotel inspired amenities and beautifully restored historic details throughout, Roost Detroit at Book Tower is the place to start your brand new chapter.

results.description: Come stay with us in the beautifully restored David Whitney Building, in stylish accommodations at Aloft Detroit at The Whitney. Featuring a 4-story atrium, and rooms with views inside of Comerica Park, our hotel in Detroit, Michigan provides a springboard for you to explore our beloved downtown Detroit and surrounding areas. The building is the closest hotel to Comerica Park, we have the only indoor People Mover station and countless dining and entertainment options are all within walking distance. Whether you're coming for business or pleasure, we have you covered!

results.name: The Siren Hotel
results.description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Detroit does not have to be difficult. Welcome to The Siren Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Nearby landmarks such as Ford Field (0.2 mi) and Detroit-Windsor Tunnel (0.6 mi) make The Siren Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Detroit.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at The Siren Hotel offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Guests of The Siren Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a lounge, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, there is paid public parking available nearby.
While in Detroit be sure to experience local fish and chips favorites at Sweetwater Tavern, Traffic Jam & Snug Restaurant, or Cornerstone Barrel House.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as The Guardian Building, GM Renaissance Center, and Campus Martius Park.
The Siren Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Detroit.

results.name: Detroit Foundation Hotel
results.description: Set in the city's circa-1929 fire department headquarters, this sleek, fashionable hotel in Downtown is 4 miles from the Detroit Institute of Arts and 5 miles from Belle Isle Park, a 982-acre island park. Chic, classically furnished rooms are adorned with local artwork and modern lighting. All have 49-inch flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi, plus minibars and desks. Suites add sitting areas with pull-out sofas; 1 has a pool table, a private bar and a dining area. Room service is offered. There's a swanky New American restaurant offering an industrial-chic bar and chef's table dining experiences. Conference rooms are available.

results.name: Fort Pontchartrain Detroit, a Wyndham Hotel
results.description: Looking for a place to stay in Detroit? Then look no further than Fort-Pontchartrain Detroit by Wyndham Downtown Riverfront, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Detroit to your doorstep. Fort-Pontchartrain Detroit by Wyndham Downtown Riverfront is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests. The hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Detroit. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available. Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Ford Field (0.7 mi) and Little Caesars Arena (1.0 mi), guests of Fort-Pontchartrain Detroit by Wyndham Downtown Riverfront can easily experience some of Detroit's most well known attractions. Detroit has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you're here, be sure to check out popular spots like Fishbones, Joe Muer Seafood, and Eastern Market Seafood Co, which are serving up some great dishes. If you're looking for things to do, you can check out Detroit Downtown (0.2 mi), Detroit RiverFront (0.5 mi), or Comerica Park (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance. We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Fort Pontchartrain Detroit by Wyndham Downtown Riverfront as you experience everything Detroit has to offer.

results.name: Sonder Gabriel Richard
results.description: Calling all sports fans, food lovers, and art enthusiasts. Motown has it all. Gabriel Richard is a historic building with stunning neoclassical architecture and a modern fitness center. Enjoy city views from your private apartment, complete with a fully equipped kitchen and in-suite laundry. Dine alfresco at Parc, where the sweet and smoky flavors from the wood-fired grill keep us coming back for more. From concerts at Campus Martius Park to shopping on Woodward Avenue and football games at Ford Field -- begin your next adventure at Gabriel Richard.

results.name: The Atheneum
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Detroit, The Atheneum is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its charming environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, The Atheneum makes it easy to enjoy the best of Detroit.
Rooms at The Atheneum Hotel provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at The Atheneum guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy a fitness center and a lounge. Need a place to park? Parking is available at Atheneum Suite Hotel.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Detroit, Atheneum Suite Hotel is located a short distance from Ford Field (0.4 mi) and Little Caesars Arena (0.8 mi).
When you're feeling hungry, be sure to check out Green Dot Stables, Kid Rock's Made in Detroit, and Sweetwater Tavern, which are some pubs that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you're looking for something to do, Detroit Downtown (0.3 mi), Detroit RiverFront (0.3 mi), and Greektown (0.1 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Atheneum Suite Hotel.
Whether you're traveling for business, pleasure or both, The Atheneum is sure to make your visit to Detroit one worth remembering.

results.name: The Inn on Ferry Street
results.description: Steps away from the state's finest museums, acclaimed Detroit Medical Center and Way State University, find yourself immersed in Detroit history staying in one of four restored Victorian homes & two carriage houses that collectively comprise The Inn on Ferry Street. East Ferry Avenue was developed in the late 1800s into an upper-class neighborhood. Eventually the homes collectively came under ownership by the Detroit Institute of Arts in the 1970s and remained so until the renovation in February 2000 where The Inn On Ferry Street began welcoming hotel guests. Designed to accommodate a visit for a weekend, conduct a business meeting, or rent an entire house for a special occasion, The Inn On Ferry Street sets the standard for elegant guest quarters and dedicated service.

The Doubletree Hotel Detroit/Dearborn near the suburban west Detroit town of Dearborn, Michigan, is only nine miles from downtown Detroit and minutes from Detroit Metro Airport (DTW). Our full-service hotel is conveniently located off the Southfield Expressway at Ford Road, with easy access to I-94, I-96 and all major Detroit-area thoroughfares.

Guests enjoy supremely comfortable designer rooms with custom furniture built by Michigan artisans and an impressive art collection featuring local artists. The hotel features a spacious fitness center with an incredible city view, sundry shop and lobby bar. You won't find anything "run-of-the-mill" here. . Enjoy events in the courtyard during warm months. Secure parking is available for a fee. Trumbull and Porter is ideally located 30 minutes from Detroit Metropolitan Airport and less than a mile from the Michigan Central Depot. results.name: The Shinola Hotel
results.description: The world's first Shinola Hotel is Detroit's new living room. Located in the heart of the city's historic Woodward shopping district, this 129-room boutique hotel offers a completely original hospitality experience. Shinola Hotel's accommodations are thoughtfully designed with varied layouts--featuring handcrafted mill-work, custom mattresses, and wallpaper inspired by patterns found during the renovation process. The property marries two restored buildings--the old T.B. Rayl & Co. sporting goods and hardware store and a former Singer sewing-machine store--with three brand new buildings modeled after downtown Detroit's historic architecture. Indulge in a diverse array of culinary experiences at Shinola Hotel, featuring some of the best new restaurants in Detroit. Grab a classic cocktail in the Living Room or Evening Bar, taste the authentic Southern Italian dishes at San Morello, or try the brews and Detroit-style fried chicken at The Brakeman and Penny Red's.

results.name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Detroit Downtown - Fort Shelby
results.description:
Feel instantly welcomed as you receive a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie the moment you step into the former iconic Fort Shelby hotel. The hotel has been restored to its former glory, with a modern edge to create the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Detroit Downtown - Fort Shelby. Located just a few blocks from the business and financial district, the hotel is just a 25-minute drive from Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (DTW). Conveniently located just one black away from the Detroit People Mover Fort/Cass station.

Make yourself comfortable in a spacious and modern suite offered as standard with thoughtful amenities like complimentary internet access, a 32-inch LCD HDTV and separate areas for sleeping and living. This downtown Detroit hotel is ideal for families, providing plenty of space with the pull-out sofa bed in the living room. Enjoy a delicious breakfast with us in Motor City Kitchen and try a refreshing drink in the trendy Round Bar.

results.name: Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Downtown
results.description:
Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Downtown is in a prime location in the Entertainment and Stadium Districts. Whether you enjoy trips to the casino, opera or local sporting events, you will be able to fill your leisure time. Local businesses and corporate offices within short distance of our hotel include Quicken Loans, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan, WellCare, Henry Ford Health Systems, Detroit Medical Center, United Auto Workers, Wayne State University and the McNamara Federal Building. We are also within a short distance of top Detroit Attractions like Comerica Park, Ford Field and Little Caesar's Arena.

Enjoy complimentary amenities including complimentary WiFi in all guest rooms and public areas, on-site fitness center, a 24-hour business center and nearly 3,500 sq. ft. of meeting space. Valet parking is available for a fee of $45 per night per vehicle for hotel guests. Event parking is based upon availability for an additional fee.

results.description: Located in Downtown Detroit, The Randolph is the perfect getaway for both short and long term stays. This historic building offers in-suite laundry, fully equipped kitchens, and stunning expansive windows overlooking the bustling city. You'll have all the comfortable essentials to make you feel right at home. Take a step outside, and you'll be surrounded by eateries, boutiques, and endless entertainment.

results.name: Hotel Indigo Detroit Downtown, an IHG Hotel
results.description: Experience the rich musical tapestry of Detroit at the Hotel Indigo Detroit Downtown. With a nod to Motown, rock 'n roll, and the evolution of hip-hop, we've infused Detroit's musical heritage into every aspect of our 241 guest rooms and suites. From Motown-themed decor to mid-century modern furnishings and local art, you'll feel the rhythm of the city. Savor the diverse flavors of Michigan at The Trolley Room, our music-themed restaurant and bar. Explore the heart of Motor City, with attractions like Ford Field and the Detroit Institute of Arts just moments away. Take in stunning skyline views at the Detroit Riverfront. Your Detroit journey starts here, where music and culture unite.

results.name: Hotel St. Regis
results.description: Welcome to the Hotel St. Regis, the most inviting landmark hotel near downtown Detroit. Among Detroit Hotels, the Hotel St Regis stands alone with its original stately elegance yet with a modern, more casual style. Delivering an extraordinary level of comfort and convenience is what we promise each of our guests. Few Detroit hotels can rightfully boast of a history as rich as ours. The Hotel St. Regis has played host to such diverse and notable travelers as Martin Luther King and Mick Jagger.Located in Detroit's New Center area, the hotel is next door to Wayne State University, the world class health facility - Henry Ford Hospital, Fisher Theatre and Cadillac Place, home of the state of Michigan Government offices. And our unique location is minutes from Detroit's major venues.Guests of the Hotel St. Regis will enjoy relaxing in comfort in one of the 124 stylish guestrooms and suites located on five floors. Each room has been newly redesigned featuring an inviting color scheme, guest bedroom & bath with marble vanities & superior bedding.Enjoy live Jazz every Thursday night from 6-9PM in our attached restaurant/lounge La Musique. Revitalization Journey - Join us on a journey of revitalization at the Hotel St. Regis, Detroit. From our reimagined guest rooms, to lobby lounge and dining experiences, we're focused on bringing the best of our past forward. Paying homage to our history, we're reviving the memorable moments that made our hospitality notable and sophisticated, then infusing cherished treasures from the 60's with the approachability and style of today. Hotel St. Regis is excited to share this journey with you, and the city we love, Detroit. Hotel St. Regis is open during the revitalization scheduled to be completed by year end 2019. Join our Journey

Attractions are easily accessible from this boutique downtown Detroit hotel including the Fox Theatre, Ford Field, Comerica Park, Joe Louis Arena & Greektown Casino. Explore the surroundings of this hotel in downtown Detroit and step out to the GM Renaissance Center, conveniently connected by skyway. Discover a multi-million dollar room renovation featuring plush bedding, spacious bathrooms, high-speed Internet, and much more. Business and leisure travelers will revel in downtown Detroit, MI hotel amenities, such as extensive meeting space, 37-inch flat panel TVs, connectivity panels and People Mover access. Maintain your workout routine in our state-of-the-art fitness center with cardiovascular equipment, free weights, and large indoor pool.

results.name: Comfort Inn Downtown Detroit
results.description: Comfort Inn is conveniently located near the Renaissance Center complex, Comerica Park ballpark, Ford Field, Joe Louis Arena and Cobo Conference / Exhibition Center. The MotorCity Casino and MGM Grand Detroit casino are within three miles. Greektown, with its many restaurants, shops and casino, is less than two miles from this Detroit, MI hotel. The UAW-Chrysler National Training Center is only two blocks from the hotel. Free shuttle service to many downtown attractions and businesses within three miles is available. There are several restaurants within walking distance. The Main Street Grille is located on the hotel premises. This Detroit, MI hotel offers business travelers conveniences like voice mail, well-lit work areas, and access to copy and fax services. There are coffee makers and hair dryers in all guest rooms. Refrigerators and microwaves are available in some rooms, as well as whirlpool bathtubs. Handicap accessible are also offered. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, Comfort Inn is the most ideally located hotel for any stay. The staff looks forward to hosting every guest visiting the Detroit area.

results.description: The Detroit Club has a rich history of being celebrated as the premier meeting place for some of the greatest business minds of our time. The meetings held behind these doors eventually led to a new age of industry, and held an integral part in launching our nation into the super power that it is today. These doors have opened once again to bring together the brightest and best minds that our great city has to offer.

results.name: Mint House Detroit - New Center
results.description: At Mint House Detroit - New Center, you will be right next door to Midtown Detroit and just one mile north of the Detroit Cultural Center Historic District, home to some of the city's best museums. Your choice of a one or two-bedroom apartment rental has up to three times the space of a traditional hotel, a full kitchen, free wi-fi, comfortable beds and spacious living areas for relaxing, entertaining, and remote working. You'll also have access to a workout room, washer/dryer and outdoor space with barbecue grills on the property.

results.name: The Inn at 97 Winder
results.description: The Inn at 97 Winder is a Second Empire 10-room mansion, combining the splendor of Detroit's glamorous past with every modern comfort and convenience to create a one-of-a-kind boutique inn. Guests enjoy such luxurious amenities as antique furnishings and art curated from across the globe, spa-quality bath products and high-thread-count linens. A peaceful massage room and well-equipped business center are also available. The Inn at 97 Winder is centrally located in historic Brush Park, across the street from Little Caesars Arena and Comerica Park, three blocks from Ford Field, a short walk from the Fox Theatre and only minutes from many other popular Detroit attractions.

results.name: Frederick Stearns House Historic Inn
results.description: The Frederick K. Stearns House is a historic inn located at 8109 East Jefferson Avenue in Detroit, Michigan, directly adjacent to the Arthur M. Parker House. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1985.[1] Contents The Frederick K. Stearns House is a two-and-one-half-story house constructed from hollow tile.[2] It has a gabled roof and stuccoed, half timber facades. The medieval feel of the house is accentuated through the use of varied window sizes, and by several projecting bays and broad roof surfaces.[2] Significance[edit] This house is significant in that it was built for Frederick K. Stearns, son of the founder of a pharmaceutical firm that built the Frederick Stearns Building, also located on Jefferson Avenue, and who served as its president from 1887 to 1921.[3] It is also significant because of its fine medieval and Arts and Crafts design.[2] The structure has been refurbished into office space. As of 2008, tenants include the Detroit-Wayne County Port Authority and Friends of Belle Isle. It had undergone extensive restoration and renovation from 2018 to 2022.[4] The house is known for its original painted glass windows and moraivan tile work and pewabic fireplace. It was opened on June 11, 2022 as a historic inn with an speakeasy downstairs. It has a large collection of oil paintings and antique furniture.

results.name: The Cochrane House Luxury Historic Inn
results.description: Set in a redbrick house built in 1870, this upscale adults-only B&B in the historic Brush Park district is a less than a mile from shows at Fox Theatre and 2 miles from the Detroit Institute of Arts. It's a mile from Interstate 75. Airy rooms provide complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and Keurig machines, as well as pull-out beds and en suite bathrooms with handcraft toiletries. results.name: 234 Winder St Inn
results.description:
Finding an ideal romantic bed and breakfast in Detroit does not have to be difficult. Welcome to 234 Winder St Inn, a nice option for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Detroit, 234 Winder St Inn is located a short distance from Ford Field (0.3 mi) and Detroit-Windsor Tunnel (1.0 mi).
Rooms at 234 Winder St Inn provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at 234 Winder St Inn guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. You can also enjoy a snack bar. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at 234 Winder St Inn.
Detroit has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you're here, be sure to check out popular spots like Mario's Restaurant, Andiamo - Riverfront, and Pizza Papalis, which are serving up some great dishes.
Detroit is also home to Tuskegee Airmen National Museum, a popular military museum that is not too far from 234 Winder St Inn.
234 Winder St Inn looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Detroit.

results.name: Oakwood At Riverfront
results.description:
See why so many travelers make Oakwood At Riverfront their hotel of choice when visiting Detroit. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a kitchenette.
The property also features a pool to make your visit even more pleasant.
While staying at Oakwood At Riverfront, visitors can check out Ford Field (1.1 mi) and Little Caesars Arena (1.2 mi), some of Detroit's top attractions.
If you like southwestern restaurants, Oakwood At Riverfront is conveniently located near Los Galanes, Taqueria El Rey, and Calexico.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a natural history museum, such as DNR Outdoor Adventure Center.
We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Oakwood At Riverfront as you experience all of the things Detroit has to offer.

results.name: Viking Motel
results.description:
Looking for a place to stay in Detroit? Then look no further than Viking Motel, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Detroit to your doorstep.
As your "home away from home," the hotel rooms offer a refrigerator and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk while staying at Viking Motel. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
While staying at Viking Motel, visitors can check out Detroit-Windsor Tunnel (1.3 mi) and GM Renaissance Center (1.4 mi), some of Detroit's top attractions.
While you're here, be sure to check out some of the diners, including Lafayette Coney Island, Parks & Rec Diner, and Dime Store, all of which are a short distance from Viking Hotel.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out some of the popular gardens, such as Anna Scripps Whitcomb Conservatory and Lafayette Greens.
We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Viking Motel as you experience everything Detroit has to offer.
results.hotel_classified_by: This property is classified according to Giata.

results.name: Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham Dearborn/Detroit MI
results.description: Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham hotels feature an all-inclusive rate that provides wired and wireless high-speed Internet access in all guest rooms and public spaces, faxes and photocopies, hot breakfast, local and long distance access, exercise facility, outdoor pool, and use of 24-hour self-service business center, and fitness facility.Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham offer oversized Studio Suites and Penthouse loft style Suites, with a full kitchen including refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, and complete dinnerware, pull-out sofa, iron, ironing board. Bath experience features the Moen showerhead, curved shower rod, hookless shower curtains and amenities from widely known brands including Neutrogena. Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham is conveniently located in the heart of Dearborn/Detroit. Nearby attractions include Greenfield Village, Henry Ford Museum, Fairlane Mall including top name retailers such as Macy's and Nordstrom. Downtown Detroit is only 15 minutes away, enjoy your visit by taking a tour of the city and perhaps stopping at the Casino or one of the top rated restaurants that are located downtown.When you stay at a Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham you can turn your stays into extraordinary rewards. Earn points that can be redeemed for hotel stays, airfare, resort vacations and a host of other dining and shopping options.

results.name: Roberts Riverwalk Hotel
results.description:
Roberts Riverwalk Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Detroit, offering a historic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Detroit, Roberts Riverwalk Hotel is located a short distance from Detroit RiverFront (1.3 mi) and Greektown (1.4 mi).
Rooms at Roberts Riverwalk Hotel provide a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Roberts Riverwalk Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and newspaper. You can also enjoy a lounge. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Roberts Riverwalk Hotel.
While staying in Detroit, you can check out a popular southwestern restaurant like Calexico, which is serving up some great dishes.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like DNR Outdoor Adventure Center (0.7 mi), William G. Milliken State Park and Harbor (0.6 mi), and James Scott Memorial Fountain (1.0 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Enjoy your stay in Detroit!
results.hotel_classified_by: This property is classified according to Giata.

results.name: Mint House Detroit - Brush Park
results.description: As our guest in a beautifully restored 1911 Arts and Crafts mansion in the heart of Detroit's Brush Park Historic District, you will have your choice of studio, one or two-bedroom apartment rentals with up to three times the space of a traditional hotel, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, free wi-fi, comfortable beds and spacious living areas for relaxing, entertaining, and remote working. At your Mint House modern apartment rental in Brush Park, you'll be able to enjoy the privacy and neighborhood feel of staying in a townhome, with convenient access to Detroit's hip Midtown nightlife and diverse restaurant scenes, nearby attractions in Downtown Detroit, Corktown, Eastern Market and Greektown, and tourist attractions like Comerica Park and The Riverwalk.
